about_the_game:
.☆.｡+:ﾟ+｡.ﾟ･.☆.:・°.･ﾟ　.ﾟ･.☆｡・°.･ﾟﾟ･.☆.

Pastel☆Parade is an exhilarating rhythm game with easy controls!

Play a comfortable rhythm to the cute and pop music.

The controls are easy to use, just press the buttons at the right tempo according to the timing!

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////

🎵 30 original songs with a groove!

Enjoy the catchy and cute songs unique to Pastel☆Parade!

Some of the songs are very challenging...! Each play is only about 1 minute, so you can enjoy it over and over again with ease.

🌟 Fun just to control! Four pop characters!

In-game operations are directly connected to the characters! Fun motions whether you succeed or fail!

Challenge yourself to a rhythmic adventure with them!

📖 A little story too...?

As you progress through the game, a story is revealed little by little.

The world is divided into 4 areas, each with a different atmosphere. How far can you go?

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Let's join the fun parade with cute characters!

.☆.｡+:ﾟ+｡.ﾟ･.☆.:・°.･ﾟ　.ﾟ･.☆｡・°.･ﾟﾟ･.☆.

Credits

Director / Programming / Animation - Matsu Friends

Art - bone

Sound Design - FALL, MasaDo, Tsuyomi, MiwoTsukushi, Akane Aomo, AMANUMA Takayuki, YMAC

Streaming Permissions

Please feel free to stream this game. When streaming, please include the title of this game and this URL on your video.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9, or later.
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

name: Pastel☆Parade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: Pastel☆Parade is an exhilarating rhythm game with easy controls! Get into the rhythm with cute and pop music!
